## LesThemes

### plusieurs méthodes pour les fonts

1-Méthode

<p>
Télécharger une font exemple: Fira Code<br>
Dans Android Studio<br>
-> new -> Android Ressource Directory -> Ressource Type => font -> Ok<br>
Nouveau dossier font<br>
Mettre les fonts dans ce dossier(pas de majuscule)<br>
Dans le fichier Type.kt<br>
</p>

```
val fira_code = FontFamily(
    Font(R.font.firacode_medium, FontWeight.Medium),
    Font(R.font.firacode_regular, FontWeight.Normal),
    Font(R.font.firacode_semibold, FontWeight.SemiBold),
    Font(R.font.firacode_bold, FontWeight.Bold),
    Font(R.font.firacode_light, FontWeight.Light)
)
```

```
@Composable
fun MyCompFont() {
    Text(
        text = "Je suis Fira Code",
        fontFamily = fira_code,
        fontSize = 40.sp,
        fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
        fontStyle = FontStyle.Italic
    )
}
```

2-Méthode
```
dependencies {
    ...
    implementation ("androidx.compose.ui:ui-text-google-fonts:1.6.1")
}
```
Initialisez GoogleFont.Provider avec les identifiants de Google Fonts 
```
val provider = GoogleFont.Provider(
    providerAuthority = "com.google.android.gms.fonts",
    providerPackage = "com.google.android.gms",
    certificates = R.array.com_google_android_gms_fonts_certs
)
```
Vous trouverez les hachages requis pour le fournisseur Google Fonts dans le fichier font_certs.xml
```
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<resources>
    <array name="com_google_android_gms_fonts_certs">
        <item>@array/com_google_android_gms_fonts_certs_dev</item>
        <item>@array/com_google_android_gms_fonts_certs_prod</item>
    </array>
    <string-array name="com_google_android_gms_fonts_certs_dev">
        <item>
            
        </item>
    </string-array>
    <string-array name="com_google_android_gms_fonts_certs_prod">
        <item>
            
        </item>
    </string-array>
</resources>
```
Définissez un FontFamily
```
 import androidx.compose.ui.text.googlefonts.GoogleFont
 import androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontFamily
 import androidx.compose.ui.text.googlefonts.Font
 // ...

val fontName = GoogleFont("Lobster Two")

val fontFamily = FontFamily(
    Font(googleFont = fontName, fontProvider = provider)
)
```
Vous pouvez interroger d'autres paramètres de police tels que l'épaisseur et le style avec FontWeight et FontStyle respectivement :
```
 import androidx.compose.ui.text.googlefonts.GoogleFont
 import androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontFamily
 import androidx.compose.ui.text.googlefonts.Font
 // ...

val fontName = GoogleFont("Lobster Two")

val fontFamily = FontFamily(
    Font(
        googleFont = fontName,
        fontProvider = provider,
        weight = FontWeight.Bold,
        style = FontStyle.Italic
    )
)
```
Configurez FontFamily à utiliser dans votre fonction composable Text:
```
Text(
    fontFamily = fontFamily, text = "Hello World!"
)
```
3-Méthodes
```
val Typography = Typography(
    bodyLarge = TextStyle(
        fontFamily = FontFamily.Default,
        fontWeight = FontWeight.Normal,
        fontSize = 16.sp,
        lineHeight = 24.sp,
        letterSpacing = 0.5.sp
    ),
    titleLarge = TextStyle(
        fontFamily = fira_code,
        fontWeight = FontWeight.Normal,
        fontSize = 30.sp,
        lineHeight = 28.sp,
        letterSpacing = 0.sp
    ),
    labelSmall = TextStyle(
        fontFamily = FontFamily.Default,
        fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
        fontSize = 11.sp,
        lineHeight = 16.sp,
        letterSpacing = 0.5.sp
    )

)
```
```
Text(
            text = "Test",
            style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleLarge
        )
```
```
val MyCustomTypography = Typography(
    bodyLarge = TextStyle(
        fontFamily = fira_code,
        fontWeight = FontWeight.Light,
        fontSize = 70.sp,
        lineHeight = 16.sp,
        letterSpacing = 0.5.sp
    )
)
```
4-Méthode
```
val Typography.customTitle: TextStyle
    @Composable
    get() {
        return TextStyle(
            fontFamily = fira_code,
            fontWeight = FontWeight.Light,
            fontSize = 30.sp
        )
    }
// Use with MaterialTheme.shapes.card
val Shapes.cardCorner: Shape
    get() = RoundedCornerShape(size = 20.dp)
 ```
